results.name: a(0)=0, a(1)=6 and a(n) = 26*a(n-1) - a(n-2) + 12 for n > 1.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (27,-27,1).
program: (PARI) concat(0, Vec(6*x*(1 + x) / ((1 - x)*(1 - 26*x + x^2)) + O(x^20))) \\ _Colin Barker_, Dec 24 2018
